pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Wavelet Analysis Using Non-Local Priors // Performs Bayesian wavelet analysis using individual non-local priors as described in Sanyal Ferreira (2017) DOI:10.1007/s13571-016-0129-3 and non-local prior mixtures as described in Sanyal (2025) DOI:10.48550/arXiv.2501.18134.
